channel.description: Recent content in Rss on Mr. Rigden's Blog

item.title: Parsing RSS feeds with Python
item.description: There are several option to parse RSS feeds for python. I wrote one of those options. pyPodcastParser is a podcast parser. It should parse any XML RSS file, but it specializes in parsing podcast feeds. It does not parse ATOM feeds. Featuring Automated testing with Travis CI 100% test coverage as measured by Coveralls An MIT license Compatibility with python 2 and python 3 Available on pyi Support of RSS 2.
